00034 @interface SpaceManager : NSObject
00035 {
00036         
00037 @private
00038         /* our chipmunk space! */
00039         cpSpace                 *_space;
00040         
00041         /* Internal devices */
00042         NSMutableArray  *_freeShapes;
00043         NSMutableArray  *_removedShapes;
00044         NSMutableArray  *_invocations;
00045         Timer                   *_timer;
00046         
00047         /* Helpful Shapes/Bodies */
00048         cpShape                 *topWall,*bottomWall,*rightWall,*leftWall;
00049         cpBody                  *_staticBody;
00050         
00051         /* Number of steps (across dt) perform on each step call */
00052         int             _steps;
00053         
00054         /* The dt used last within step */
00055         cpFloat _lastDt;
00056         
00057         /* Options:
00058                 -cleanupBodyDepenencies will also free contraints connected to a free'd shape
00059                 -iterateStatic will call _iterateFunc on static shapes
00060                 -rehashStaticEveryStep will rehash static shapes at the end of every step
00061                 -iterateFunc; default will update cocosnodes for pos and rotation
00062                 -constantDt; set this to a non-zero number to always step the simulation with that dt
00063         */
00064         BOOL                            _cleanupBodyDependencies;
00065         BOOL                            _iterateStatic;
00066         BOOL                            _rehashStaticEveryStep;
00067         cpSpaceHashIterator     _iterateFunc;
00068         cpFloat                         _constantDt;
00069 }
